resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81829</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81829</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4214</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Homework fo children with Learning Difficulties</string>
            <string language="es">Deberes para los niños con dificultades de aprendizaje</string>
            <string language="ga">Obair Bhaile do dhaltaí le Deacrachtaí Foghlama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heimarbeit fo Kinder mit erlernenschwierigkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enfants de fo de travail avec des difficultés 
d'étude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crianças do fo do homework com dificuldades de 
aprendizagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bambini di fo di lavoro con le difficoltà 
imparanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιδιά των FO εργασίας με τις μαθησιακές δυσκολίες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These advice sheets are aimed at children with special needs(learning difficulties), who are experiencing difficulty with homework.</string>
            <string language="es">Estas hojas de consejos a niños con necesidades especiales (dificultades de aprendizaje) que estén experimentando dificultades con los deberes de casa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá na bileogaí comhairle seo dírithe ar dhaltaí le riachtanais speisialta (deacrachtaí foghlama), a bhfuil deacracht acu le hobair bhaile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">General</string>
            <string language="es">General. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Ginearálta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Rateblätter sind- angestrebte Kinder mit 
speziellen needs(learning Schwierigkeiten), die auf Schwierigkeit mit 
Heimarbeit stoßen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces feuilles de conseil sont les enfants 
visés avec les difficultés needs(learning spéciales), qui 
éprouvent la difficulté avec le travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas folhas do conselho são crianças visadas 
com dificuldades needs(learning especiais), que estão experimentando 
a dificuldade com homework.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi fogli di consiglio sono bambini puntati su
con le difficoltà needs(learning speciali), che stanno incontrando la
difficoltà con lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα φύλλα συμβουλών στοχεύουν στα παιδιά με τις 
ειδικές needs(learning δυσκολίες), οι οποίες αντιμετωπίζουν τη 
δυσκολία με την εργασία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Généralités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generalità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4214</entry>
          </identifier>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>

          </contribute>
